summary: A fix for the incorrect voice acting of Marked For Death lvls 2 and 3.
descriptionHtml:
IT'S NOW FIXED BY USKP!

Quote from

http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Marked_for_Death

"The voice acting for this shout is incorrect; the character will say "Lun Lun" for Lv.2 and "Lun Lun Aus" for Lv.3."

This is a fix for that. The correct shout is "Krii Lun Aus". Most people probably don't realise the mistake but it bothered me so I fixed it.

- Put the "Sound" folder included in the archive into your data folder.
author: Phnx
